command: python -c "import platform, subprocess; print(int(subprocess.run(\"ss -s | grep -oP '(?<=estab ).*(?= tcp)'\" if platform.system() == 'Linux' else 'powershell \"(Get-NetTCPConnection | Measure-Object).Count\"' if platform.system() == 'Windows' else 'netstat -an | grep ESTABLISHED | wc -l', shell=True, text=True, capture_output=True).stdout.strip()), end='')"

python -c "import platform, subprocess; cmd = {'Linux': 'lsusb', 'Windows': 'powershell Get-PnpDevice -Class USB', 'Darwin': 'system_profiler SPUSBDataType'}.get(platform.system()); subprocess.run(cmd, shell=True) if cmd else print('Unsupported OS')"
